Penumbral_Grasp.display_help: Penumbral Grasp deals moderate Negative Energy damage, reduces their chance to hit and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Penumbral_Grasp.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DOT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
Penumbral_Grasp.display_target_help: You have been entangled by Penumbral Grasp and have been left immobilized.

Smite.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a Smite that deals High negative energy damage. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering its chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Smite.display_target_help: The Smite has reduced your Accuracy.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Death_Shroud.display_help: You become a focus point for the Netherworld, allowing its Negative Energy to seep from your body. This will continuously damage all foes in melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Death_Shroud.display_target_help: You are taking damage from the Death Shroud.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Shadow_Maul.display_help: You wrap your entire arms with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a series of blows that deal a lot of damage over a short period of time to multiple targets in front of you. These blows cloud your target's vision, lowering his chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Shadow_Maul.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Shadow Maul.

Soul_Drain.display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Touch_of_Fear.display_help: The Netherworld is one scary place, and with but a touch, you can give your enemy a glimpse into this dark world. This will cause them to helplessly tremble in Fear. Foes in this state of panic have reduced chance to hit. Additionally, drawing upon this connection to the Netherworld causes you to rapidly regenerate health and recover endurance for a short time. Recharge: Moderate
Touch_of_Fear.display_target_help: You are terrified and your chance to hit is reduced.

Your {PowerName} causes you to rapidly recover both health and endurance!

Dark_Consumption.display_help: The dark power of the Netherworld allows you to tap the essence of your foe's soul and transfer it to yourself. This will drain the Hit Points of your enemy and add to your Endurance. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Dark_Pit.display_help: Envelops a targeted foe and any nearby enemies in a pit of Negative Energy. The attack deals no damage, but Disorients all affected foes for a good while. Recharge: Slow

Midnight_Grasp.display_help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to create dark tentacles that can Immobilize a foe and continuously drain his life force. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Midnight_Grasp.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
Midnight_Grasp.display_target_help: The dark tentacles of the Midnight Grasp are holding you immobile. Your chance to hit is reduced.
